Record.ClassificationPath: Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Leukocyte Disorders/Pelger-Huet Anomaly
Record.Description: An inherited defect interfering with normal nuclear lobulation of neutrophils and eosinophils. The nuclei appear rodlike, spherical, or dumbbell-shaped and their structure is coarse and lumpy. (From Dorland, 27th ed)
